|website = [http://www.suno.edu www.suno.edu] |logo = |footnotes = }}'Southern
University at New Orleans' (often referred to by its initials 'SUNO') is a
historically African American university located in New Orleans, Louisiana,
United States. It is a member of the Southern University System. The University
is a member-school of Thurgood Marshall College Fund.
categories: Historically black universities and colleges in the United States
